duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with pediatric eye care, routine eye exams, and ophthalmic surgical interventions.
Provide exceptional patient care and focus on a positive attitude.
Work as a team with strong interpersonal skills.
Utilize strong computer skills, attention to detail, and accuracy.
Serve a key role in the practice and contribute to all specialties of ophthalmology.

education_certification.credential: Healthcare background or medical assistant experience. Certification strongly encouraged.
